meanings.definition: Resistant to the penetration of dust.
meanings.sent1: The new phone case is dustproof, so it won't let any dust inside.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to choose a dustproof cover for your electronic devices.
meanings.sent3: The dustproof jacket kept the adventurer's belongings safe during the dusty journey.
meanings.sent4: Her trusty dustproof umbrella shielded her from the dusty wind.
meanings.sent5: The dustproof seal on the container ensured the contents remained clean and untouched.

meanings.definition: Designed to prevent the entry of dust.
meanings.sent1: The dustproof computer casing is essential for dusty environments.
meanings.sent2: The dustproof camera lens is perfect for outdoor photography.
meanings.sent3: The dustproof curtains in the room made it feel like a secret dusty-free zone.
meanings.sent4: His dustproof plan for the attic kept it clean and free of dust for years.
meanings.sent5: The dustproof barrier around the construction site kept the area clean and safe from dust.

meanings.sent1: The dustproof mask was a lifesaver in the dusty workshop.
meanings.sent2: The dustproof packaging ensured the product arrived in perfect condition.
meanings.sent3: The dustproof coating on the car made it sparkle even in dusty conditions.
meanings.sent4: The dustproof filter in the vacuum cleaner traps all the dust effectively.
meanings.sent5: The dustproof material of the curtains kept the room pristine and dust-free.
